body.raw:
We seek a [middle way](https://artearthtech.com/2017/06/28/the-middle-way/), a synthesis …

                          Synthesis

          Spritual                          Material

          Intuition                         Rigour
          Creativity                        Analysis
          Beyond language                   Language

          Idealistic                        Pragmatic

          Collective                        Individual

body.raw: Rufus Pollock is a Founder of Open Knowledge, an award-winning international digital non-profit. Formerly a Shuttleworth Fellow, the Mead Fellow in Economics at Cambridge University.
